Package src.Controller

package src.Controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    src
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdministratorController
    The AdministratorController class provides methods for managing staff, inventory, and appointments, allowing the administrator to add, update, remove, and filter staff and inventory data.
    AppointmentController
    The AppointmentController class manages the creation of new appointments between doctors and patients.
    AppointmentOutcomeController
    The AppointmentOutcomeController class manages the creation and handling of appointment outcome records.
    AuthController
    The AuthController class handles user authentication and password management.
    AvailabilityController
    The AvailabilityController class manages a doctor's availability schedule, allowing retrieval and updates to the schedule.
    DoctorController
    The DoctorController class provides methods for a doctor to manage patients, appointments, and medical records, including functions to find patients, access medical histories, and filter appointments by status.
    NurseController
    The NurseController class provides methods for nurses to manage patient data, including adding, retrieving, and removing patients from the system.
    PatientController
    The PatientController class manages operations related to a specific patient.
    PharmacistController
    The PharmacistController class provides methods for managing medication stock and updating prescriptions within appointments.

    UserController
